metadata.title: CVE-2022-22677 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A logic issue in the handling of concurrent media was addressed with improved state handling. The video in a webRTC call may be interrupted if the audio capture gets interrupted.

notes.note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'reached end-of-life').
wpewebkit package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
